about_the_game:
🌟 Welcome, fellow gamers, to the enchanting universe of SEX Hotel Simulator 18+! 🌈 Immerse yourself in the role of a savvy hotel owner in this visually stunning novel simulator. From a humble abode to a luxury haven for lovers, your journey starts now!

🛎️ Begin your odyssey by micromanaging every aspect of your business – hiring staff, maintaining spotless cleanliness, and expanding your establishment. Navigate through diverse characters and conquer intriguing tasks on your climb to the zenith of the hotel industry.

⚠️ But tread carefully – guests bring both joy and challenges. It's your duty to safeguard your hotel's reputation, unveil mysteries, and keep the peace. Recruit ingenious staff, hone your skills, and make each moment a thrilling experience for you and your establishment.

🌟 SEX Hotel Simulator 18+ isn't just a business simulator; it's an enthralling story with adult nuances. Dive into a world of emotions, interactions, and the evolution of your hotel for lovers. An extraordinary gaming experience awaits, where every decision shapes the unfolding narrative. Your adventure kicks off now!

🚀 Ready to craft your own love story and business empire? Grab Love Hotel Sim on Steam and let the journey begin! 🎮✨

Features:
  • A captivating narrative that unfolds as you progress
  • Intuitive gameplay that celebrates and rewards your imaginative flair.
  • Immerse yourself in real-time 3D characters and animations
  • Explore a plethora of alluring scenarios that add spice to the gameplay
  • Convenient one-handed play option for a truly hands-on experience. ( ͡~ ͜ʖ ͡°)

content_descriptors.notes: This game contains content not appropriate for all ages, or for viewing at work: sexual acts, nudity, game graphically depicts sex. All characters in the game are over the age of 18.

name: SEX Hotel Simulator 18+

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 or above
  • Processor: Intel or AMD
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Direct X compatible
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
